A set of useful javascript and sass tools â€“ view on npm

node Simple function to return a node
returnNode Checks if an element is a node, if not it returns a node
returnTag Returns the tagname of an element
fieldTypes Returns the fieldtype of an input-element
eventCallback Execute code when a eventlistener is triggered
new Element Easily create new nodes
connection Get the users internet speed/connection
new Api Fetch data end choose the output format
getFormData Retrieve formdata, without submitting
Setup cutlery.js How to setup cutlery.js
event Add an eventlistener to a single element
